parameters.name: AddInstanceList
parameters.description: The list of instances to be added in this rule update. This parameter does not need to be passed if there are no instances to add.

parameters.name: DeleteInstanceList
parameters.description: The list of instances to be removed in this rule update. This parameter does not need to be passed if there are no instances to remove.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description:
Rule ID.
> You can obtain this parameter by calling the [ListCheckRule](~~2590599~~) API.

parameters.name: RuleType
parameters.description:
Rule type. Default is **WHITE**. Values:
- **WHITE**: Add to whitelist

parameters.name: ScopeType
parameters.description:
The scope of effect for modifying the rule:
- **INSTANCE**: Instance
- **ITEM**: Check item
